data.name: Glorkian Warrior OST
data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack For Glorkian Warrior.

All tracks written by Mark DeNardo. Additional production and mixing on some tracks by Miles Tilmann

1. In Space No One Can Hear You Glork - Part 1 01:39
2. The Spice is the Glork 02:37
3. Round and Round and Round 03:18
4. Glorkian Warrior 04:00
5. Super Backpack 03:04
6. Flarf 00:25
7. Tri-Blurxibeast 01:04
8. Zoe and Chloe Elucidate a Quest 00:26
9. Glorky Ocarina 01:07
10. Florpagroinker 01:40
11. Tennis Balls 01:51
12. Slurpazoinker 00:29
13. Gamelan Deevil 04:45
14. Tetromino Folk Dance 01:39
15. In Space No One Can Hear You Glork - Part 2 02:38

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything
  • Processor: Whatever, it's MP3's
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: All of the graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sure
